title: mangaLa nAyaki malaraDi
sahitya:
mangaLa nAyaki malaraDi paNindAl mAmOha iruL aghalum aruLoLi vIshum


anupallavi

  shankaran Adi kumbEshvaran pangurai sarvajagan mAtAvAna


caraNam    gangaiyil shianda kAvirik-karaiyil sArangapANiyin tangai enrulagam
 vaNangip-pugazh aruL tunga malai arashan arum tava maghaLAi vanda dayAnNidhi
